content:
I'm looking to recover from a corrupt psql instance and I'm installing a new. So I wiped the psql instance and ran initialize_database from the scripts directory. Now every time I login to a client I'm getting: 

 insert or update on table "zerver_useractivity" violates foreign key constraint "zerver_useractivity_client_id_bb848fef_fk_zerver_client_id"
Key (client_id)=(3) is not present in table "zerver_client"

and yeah sure enough client id 3 doesn't not exist in zerver_client

@Saqib Rokadia you should probably get a support contract if you want help with this; it sounds like you've done something weird in your setup that isn't our documented backup/restore process, and we can't provide free support for that.
ok thanks, I'll see if I can figure it out otherwise I'll work through support.
